topic.title: PageManager
topic.shortdesc: Allows you to reorder and control the pages in your site.

section.title: Introduction
section.p:
This module provides all the functionaility to manage the pages in your site.
Features include:
Sorting your site tree
Adding new page with several configuration options
Delete page
Edit page properties
